description: Anthropic Messages API with base64 image input

content.text:
• **Main subject**: A small bird with distinctive black and white striped markings on its head and wings, perched on what appears to be a wooden surface

• **Colors**: Predominantly black and white coloration with the bird's striped pattern contrasting against a soft, muted background in neutral tones

• **Composition**: The bird is positioned slightly off-center in the frame, creating visual interest, with a shallow depth of field that keeps the subject in sharp focus while softly blurring the background
